function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconveniences in the distribution and stock of materials","Impact":"Disruption in material supply chain, leading to project delays and cost overruns","Mitigation":"Establishing backup suppliers, optimizing inventory management, and diversifying sourcing channels","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, RFID tracking, predictive analytics","People":"Supplier and subcontractor, Construction worker","Owner":"Project management, Construction company"},{"Description":"Public management inconveniences related to quarantine and restrictions","Impact":"Inefficient management of quarantine measures, leading to increased risk of disease spread and public unrest","Mitigation":"Implementing efficient quarantine protocols, providing clear communication, and monitoring compliance","Technologies":"Digital tracking and monitoring, communication platforms, data analytics","People":"Public agencies, Project team","Owner":"Public agencies, Project management"}]}
